Appetizers.description: Baked in marinara and melted 					mozzarella cheese
Fried to a golden brown and served 				with marinara sauce
Jumbo Shrimp sauced in butter, brandy 					wine, garlic, fresh basil, shallots
Sauteed in olive oil, garlic, 					shallots, sherry wine, and marinara
Sauteed mussels in olive oil, garlic, 					shallots, sherry wine, and marinara

Homemade Baked Pastas.description: Penne pasta ricotta cheese and 					marinara sauce topped with mozzarella cheese
Pasta stuffed and rolled with ricotta 					cheese, stuffed with marinara and mozzarella cheese
Stuffed ravioli pasta, topped with marinara  and mozzarella cheese, served with a small side of spaghetti marinara

Entrees.description: Cheese tortellini sauteed in cream sauce and a touch of marinara
Cheese tortellini sauteed in a pesto sauce
Spaghetti with meatballs, meat sauce, mushrooms, and sausage
